snippet.title: Phonopolis | Trailer | Future Games Show June 2022
snippet.description:
Phonopolis is a new game from the minds behind Happy Game, Amanita Design. In Phonopolis, you’ll help Felix solve playful puzzles in an avant-garde fibreboard city. The Future Game Show is happy to reveal this gameplay for Phonopolis!

Our Socials - YouTube: www.youtube.com/GamesRadar
Twitter: www.twitter.com/FutureGamesShow
Facebook: www.facebook.com.GamesRadar
Twitch: www.twitch.tv/GamesRadar
